main event: A civilian reported seeing a saucer-shaped object changing direction several times on December 12, 1960.
interesting points: The object was approximately 15 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted for about 5 seconds., The object exhibited a zigzag motion., No physical evidence was left from the sighting., The observer reported conflicting data in the conclusion.
witness description: The observer was a civilian with some interest in aviation and model rocketry.
